list_definition.definition: the art of using movement to perform the function of speech, especially in drama
a play in which no words are spoken and the actions tell the story
an actor in such a play; someone who practises this art

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Marcel Marceau was a famous mime.

list_definition.definition: to act, eg in such a play, using movements rather than words

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He mimed his love for her by holding his hands over his heart.
